title: WTT: My T205 Ewing Polar Bear for your Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Ewing Polar Bear for your Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in trading?  I have other cards as well, so shoot me your email if you'd like to see my current list!  I'm looking for T205/T206 Sovereign cards.

Take Care,
Geno
